attributes.action: Allow the BBC to continue to show the FA Cup Final.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Next year the FA cup final will no longer be shown on the BBC and will instead be shown on ITV. ITV's coverage of football games in the past have been terrible, advert breaks every few minutes during pre and post match analysis for example. I believe that the FA Cup final should remain at it's home on BBCs Match of the Day with its superior format and much liked pundits.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
